Corporate LoFi

We Made Max Goof Study Forever

Corporate LoFi: We Made Max Goof Study Forever

LoFi never sold out — but it definitely signed some contracts. We reimagined Disney’s Max Goof as the poster child for corporate chill — and then ran with it. What started as a quick sketch turned into a full-blown ambient satire loop. Keyboard clicks as percussion. Slack pings reverbing into the abyss. Fluorescent buzz as bassline. Max stares endlessly, studying contracts he’ll never understand.

It’s absurd. It’s soothing. It’s very us.

File under: the best background track for pretending to work in the multiverse.
